html,body#layout body#layout .row{width:auto;padding:0}body#layout{position:relative;width:100%;background-color:#fff;border:none;}body#layout:before{content:"Zap Mag - v1.5.0";position:absolute;top:0;left:5px;right:5px;height:95px;font-size:23px;color:#263238;line-height:95px;text-align:center;font-family: Arial;} body#layout div.section{display:block;border: 0.5px solid rgba(25,118,210,.1);background-color: rgba(25,118,210,.1);}body#layout .section h4{display:-webkit-box;font-size:14px;color:#263238;text-transform:uppercase;margin:0}body#layout .section h4:after{text-transform:initial;color:#757575;font-weight:400}body#layout .add_widget a{display:-webkit-box;color:#4385f5!important}body#layout .widget-wrap3{overflow:hidden}body#layout .widget-content{width:auto;max-width:none;max-height:none;margin:0;border:1px solid #e7e7e8;border-left:0}body#layout .locked-widget .widget-content{border-left:1px solid #4385f5}body#layout .locked-widget .widget-content:hover{border-left-color:#33a453}body#layout div.layout-title{display:-webkit-box;color:#757575}body#layout .widget .widget-content a.editlink{border-radius:2px}body#layout .visibility .editlink{background:#4385f5 .draggable-widget .widget-wrap1:hover .widget-wrap2{background-color:#33a453!important}body#layout .visibility div.layout-widget-description{display:none;font-size:11px;line-height:1.2em}body#layout #header-logo {width:45%;float:left;}body#layout #header-link {width: 45%;float:right;}body#layout #main-content{width: 65%; float: left}body#layout .zapmag-sidebar {width:34%; float: right;}body#layout .sticky-sidebar {width:30%; float: right!important;clear: right;}body#layout #footer .content>::before{content:attr(aria-label);font-size:12px;margin:-4px 15px}.rakib-post-pagination .content>*{margin:0 10px;flex:0 0 calc(50% - #dbdbdb}th{font-weight:600}.back-to-top{display:none;position:fixed;bottom:45px;right:20px;padding:5px;width:40px;height:40px;background-color:#1976d2;color:#fff;border:none;border-radius:5px;cursor:pointer;animation:.5s forwards topIn;z-index:90}.cloud-label li a,.modal,footer,input[type=search]{background-color:#fff}@keyframes topIn{from{opacity:0;transform:translateY(30px)}to{opacity:1;transform:translateY(0)}}.back-to-top.fadeOut{animation:.5s forwards topOut}@keyframes topOut{from{opacity:1;transform:translateY(0)}to{opacity:0;transform:translateY(30px)}}.accordion{margin:1em 0;overflow:hidden;border:1px solid #dbdbdb;background:#fff;color:#121212;border-radius:4px}.accordion>div+div>.accordion-title{border-top:1px solid;border-color:#dbdbdb}.accordion-title{display:flex;justify-content:space-between;column-gap:10px;cursor:pointer;padding:12px 16px;font-weight:600;align-items:center}.accordion-title:after{content:url("data:image/svg+xml;utf8,");width:18px;height:18px;line-height:18px;filter:initial;transition:transform .3s}.accordion-title.open:after{transform:rotate(-180deg)}.accordion-title.open+.accordion-content{padding-bottom:16px}.accordion-content{overflow:hidden;font-size:15px;padding:0 16px;transition:padding-bottom .3s,height .3s}.post-tab>ul.tabbed-post{display:flex;flex-wrap:wrap;font-size:15px}.post-tab>ul.tabbed-post>li{display:flex;column-gap:6px;padding:8px 20px;cursor:pointer;opacity:.7;border-bottom:1px solid #dbdbdb}.post-tab>ul.tabbed-post>li.open{cursor:auto;opacity:1;position:relative;border:none}.post-tab>ul.tabbed-post>li.open:before{content:"";position:absolute;bottom:0;left:0;width:100%;height:2px;background:#1976d2}.post-tab>ul.tabbed-post>li:hover{opacity:1}.post-tab>ul.tabbed-post-content>li>:first-child{margin-top:0}.post-tab>ul.tabbed-post-content>li>:last-child{margin-bottom:0}.list-step:is(ul,ol){list-style:none;margin:0;padding:0}.list-step{counter-reset:n;line-height:1.6}.list-step>li{position:relative;padding-inline-start:30px;padding-block-end:18px;counter-increment:n}.list-step>li::before{content:counter(n);display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;position:absolute;inset-block-start:0;inset-inline-start:0;width:20px;height:20px;border:1px solid #1976d2;border-radius:50%;font-weight:500;font-size:smaller;color:#1976d2;transition:background-color .3s}.list-step>li::after{content:"";position:absolute;inset-block:calc(20px + 8px) 8px;inset-inline-start:calc(20px / 2);border-inline-start:1px solid #1976d2}.list-step>li:hover::before{background-color:#1976d2;border-color:#1976d2;color:#fff}.is-single{display:block!important;flex:none!important}.meta-infos span{margin-right:10px;display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center;color:#3e4c6a}.meta-infos span .title-link:hover{opacity:.9}.widget-title:after{content:"";width:50px;height:25px;border-radius:10px
